English
Eddie Cusack is a Chicago police officer about to bust some members of the
Comacho gang when the gang is shot up by a rival drug gang from the neighboring
building, led by Tony Luna. Victor Comacho is the only survivor of the Comacho
gang and his older brother, Luis, who is the leader of the gang, retaliates by
killing Luna's family and kidnaps Luna's daughter, Diana. Cusack must face Tony
Luna and Luis Comacho alone because nobody on the police force is willing to
help him since he was the only cop who broke the code of silence by testifying
against a fellow cop who killed an unarmed teenager, but Cusack is not really
alone. A police robot called "Prowler" aides Cusack as he takes down the gangs.
